name: moderngl
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "moderngl" %}
{% set version = "5.5.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/moderngl/moderngl/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 490bc688f22f2e6bddcfd667195b6c6835a53fcb9de236f6c60965193f14a982

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  skip: True  # [py<35]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ cdt('libx11-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xorg-x11-proto-devel') }}  # [linux]

  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - numpy

  run:
    - python
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}

test:
  imports:
    - moderngl
    - moderngl.mgl

about:
  home: https://github.com/moderngl/moderngl
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Modern OpenGL binding for python'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cprogrammer1994
    - patricksnape
